spell_tooltip.description:
Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 76,455 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 75,134 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 75,076 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.
Shift partially into the elemental planes, taking 40% less damage for 12 sec.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 84,758 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 85,293 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 84,150 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Protects the target with an earthen shield, increasing your healing on them by 20% and healing them for 83,561 when they take damage. This heal can only occur once every few seconds. Maximum 9 charges.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.
Chills the target with frost, causing 59,921 Frost damage and reducing the target's movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Purges the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
Removes all Curse effects from a friendly target.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.
Calls upon the guidance of the spirits for 15 sec, permitting movement while casting Shaman spells. Castable while casting. Increases movement speed by 20%.
For the next 10 sec, 25% of your healing done and 25% of your damage done is converted to healing on up to 3 nearby injured party or raid members, up to 753,033 healing to each target per second.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 7,523 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Interrupting a spell with Wind Shear decreases your damage taken from that spell school by 15% for 18 sec. Stacks up to 2 times.
Summons a totem at your feet that removes all Poison effects from a nearby party or raid member within 30 yards every 1.5 sec for 6 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem with 1.1 million health at the feet of the caster for 30 sec, granting the caster a shield absorbing 1.6 million damage for 15 sec, and up to an additional 168,953 every 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of otemic Recall by 60 sec.
Every 300 Maelstrom spent replaces your next Lightning Bolt with Tempest.
Spending Maelstrom grants you 1% haste for 15 sec, stacking. Gaining a new stack does not refresh the duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature damage spells by 5% and the critical strike damage of your Nature spells by 5%.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning Elemental Overloads have a 50% chance to cause an additional Elemental Overload.
When Tempest strikes more than one target, your next 2 Chain Lightning spells are instant cast and deal 40% increased damage.
Crash Lightning, Chain Lightning, and Earthquake damage increased by 15%.
Lightning Rod targets now also take 20% of the damage that Tempest deals, and Tempest also applies Lightning Rod effect.
Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning have a chance to strike your target for 102,163 Nature damage. Every 3 times this occurs, your next Lightning Bolt is replaced by Tempest.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 273,211 Nature damage.

Causes the earth within 8 yards of your target to tremble and break, dealing 161,731 Physical damage over 7 sec and has a 5% chance to knock the enemy down. Multiple uses of Earthquake may overlap.

his spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Storm Elemental to hurl gusts of wind that damage the Shaman's enemies for 36 sec.

While the Storm Elemental is active, each time you cast Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning, the cast time of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning is reduced by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.

Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.

Casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of your Nature spells by 1.0 sec.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

lame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

ightning Bolt: Your next cast will cause 2 additional Elemental Overloads.

hain Lightning: Your next cast will chain to 1 additional target.

ava Burst: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 4.0 sec.

rost Shock: Freezes the target in place for 6 sec.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Casting Lava Burst has a chance to replace your next Frost Shock with Icefury, stacking up to 2 times.

 cefury
Hurls frigid ice at the target, dealing 222,279 Frost damage and causing your next 2 Frost Shocks to deal 225% increased damage and generate 10 Maelstrom.

enerates 12 Maelstrom.

Reduces the cast time of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 0.25 sec.

Increases the duration of Earthquake by 1 sec.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.
After casting Icefury, the next time you cast a Nature and a Fire spell, you additionally cast an Elemental Blast at your target at 60% effectiveness.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Elemental Fury increases critical strike damage by an additional 25%.

While a Storm Elemental is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 10%.

While a Fire Elemental is active, your Fire damage dealt is increased by 10%.
While Lightning Shield is active, your Nature damage dealt is increased by 8%.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases the duration of your Elementals by 20%.
Reduces the cooldown of Flame Shock by 1.5 sec and Flame Shock deals damage 15% faster.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Earth Shock and Earthquake by 5.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Elemental Blast by 10.
Increases the damage dealt by your Elemental Overloads by 10%.
When your Storm Elemental or Fire Elemental expires, it leaves behind a lesser Elemental to continue attacking your enemies for 15 sec.

Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, dealing 30,177 Elemental damage and applying Flame Shock to them.

Your next Lava Burst will also hit all targets affected by your Flame Shock for 50% of normal damage.
Activating Stormkeeper summons a powerful Lightning Elemental to fight by your side for 9.6 sec.
Flame Shock damage over time critical strikes reduce the cooldown of your Fire and Storm Elemental by 1.0 sec, and Flame Shock has a 50% increased critical strike chance.
Flame Shock damage increases the damage of your next Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, or Earthquake by 1.5%, stacking up to 10 times.
Primordial Wave grants you 10% Haste plus 4% for each additional Lava Burst generated by Primordial Wave for 12 sec.
Tempest, Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake make your target a Lightning Rod for 8 sec. Lightning Rods take 20% of all damage you deal with Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning.
Your Earth, Fire, and Storm Elementals are drawn from primal elementals 80% more powerful than regular elementals, with additional abilities, and you gain direct control over them.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 52,680 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 8 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.9 sec for 6 sec, dealing 28,545 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yards.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 73,881 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 76,152 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 74,723 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 84,376 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 84,424 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.
Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 273,051 Nature damage.

his spell is cast at your target.
Your damaging critical strikes deal 275% damage instead of the usual 200%.

Calls forth a Greater Fire Elemental to rain destruction on your enemies for 36 sec. 

While the Fire Elemental is active, Flame Shock deals damage 
33% faster, and newly applied Flame Shocks last 100% longer.

Increases the critical strike chance of Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning by 10%.

Casting Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning reduces the cooldown of your Nature spells by 1.0 sec.

Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake enhance your next spell cast within 15 sec:

lame Shock: The next cast also applies Flame Shock to 1 additional target within 8 yards of the target.

Increases the duration of Earthquake by 1 sec.
Casting Lava Burst increases the damage or healing of your next Nature, Physical, or Frost spell by 15%.

Increases your maximum Maelstrom by 50.

Increases Earth Shock, Elemental Blast, and Earthquake damage by 5%.
Increases the Maelstrom generated by Lightning Bolt and Lava Burst by 2.
Icefury causes your Frost Shocks to damage up to 3 additional enemies and targets hit take 15% increased Nature damage from your spells for 9 sec.
Casting Lava Burst has a 60% chance to cause your next Lightning Bolt or Chain Lightning cast to trigger Elemental Overload an additional time, stacking up to 2 times.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Earth Shock and Earthquake by 5.

Reduces the Maelstrom cost of Elemental Blast by 10.
Dealing direct Fire, Frost, and Nature damage within 10 sec will increase all damage dealt by 10% for 10 sec. This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Casting Lava Burst has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 scendance

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, replacing Chain Lightning with Lava Beam, removing the cooldown on Lava Burst, and increasing the damage of Lava Burst by an amount equal to your critical strike chance.

When you transform into the Flame Ascendant, instantly cast a Lava Burst at all enemies affected by your Flame Shock, and refresh your Flame Shock durations to 18 sec.

Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, dealing 30,417 Elemental damage and applying Flame Shock to them.

Your next Lava Burst will also hit all targets affected by your Flame Shock for 50% of normal damage.

After casting Earth Shock, your next Earthquake deals 120% additional damage.

After casting Elemental Blast, your next Earthquake deals 140% additional damage.

Hurls molten lava at the target, dealing 76,509 Fire damage. Lava Burst will always critically strike if the target is affected by Flame Shock.

Summons a totem at the target location that erupts dealing 51,835 Fire damage and applying Flame Shock to 3 enemies within 8 yards. Continues hurling liquid magma at a random nearby target every 0.9 sec for 6 sec, dealing 28,985 Fire damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Primordial Wave summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that increases the critical effect of damage and healing spells of all nearby allies within 40 yards by 15% for 15 sec.
Summons a totem at your feet that will redirect all harmful spells cast within 30 yards on a nearby party or raid member to itself. Will not redirect area of effect spells. Lasts 3 sec.
Heals the friendly target for 138,773, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 136,789, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 134,591, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

enerates 8 Maelstrom.

Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 83,157 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 5 total targets.

enerates 2 Maelstrom per target hit.

Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman.
Disrupts the target's concentration with a burst of wind, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell in that school from being cast for 2 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Astral Shift by 30 sec.
While transformed into a Ghost Wolf, you gain 5% increased movement speed and 5% damage reduction every 1 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Increases the number of Elemental Shields you can have active on yourself by 1.

You can have Earth Shield on yourself and one ally at the same time.
Increases all Fire and Frost damage you deal by 3%.
Summons a totem at the target location that gathers electrical energy from the surrounding air and explodes after 2 sec, stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 sec.
A gust of wind hurls you forward.
Maximum health increased by 10%, and while you are at full health, Reincarnation cools down 75% faster.
Reduces the cooldown of Capacitor Totem by 5 sec for each enemy it stuns, up to a maximum reduction of 20 sec.

Calls forth a Greater Earth Elemental to protect you and your allies for 1.2 min.

While this elemental is active, your maximum health is increased by 15%.
Healing from Healing Stream Totem reduces Fire, Frost, and Nature damage taken by 6% for 3 sec.
When your health is brought below 35%, you instantly heal for 20% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 45 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Nature spells and abilities by 4%.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 6%.
While you have an elemental active, your damage taken is reduced by 5%.

For the next 10 sec, 25% of your healing done and 25% of your damage done is converted to healing on up to 3 nearby injured party or raid members, up to 753,033 healing to each target per second.

Calls down a bolt of lightning, dealing 7,698 Nature damage to all enemies within 10 yards, reducing their movement speed by 40% for 5 sec, and knocking them away from the Shaman. Usable while stunned.

Increases the radius of your totem effects by 15%.

Increases the duration of your Earthbind and Earthgrab Totems by 10 sec.

Increases the duration of your Healing Stream, Tremor, Poison Cleansing, and Wind Rush Totems by 3.0 sec.
The effects of your weapon imbues are increased by 30%.
Reduces the cooldown of Spiritwalker's Grace by 30 sec and increases your movement speed by 20% while it is active.
Reduces the cooldown of your totems by 6 sec.
Thunderstorm knocks enemies up instead of away and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Resets the cooldown of your most recently used totem with a base cooldown shorter than 3 minutes.
Your next healing or damaging Nature spell is instant cast and costs no mana.
Summons a totem with 1.1 million health at the feet of the caster for 30 sec, granting the caster a shield absorbing 1.6 million damage for 15 sec, and up to an additional 168,953 every 5 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of otemic Recall by 60 sec.
Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 122,542 and an additional 68,393 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 108,080 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Deal 34,866 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.
An efficient wave of healing energy that restores 261,496 of a friendly targets health.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Targets you heal with Healing Wave, Healing Surge, Chain Heal, or Riptide's initial heal gain 10% increased health for 10 sec.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.
Your critical heals have 215% effectiveness instead of the usual 200%.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 10 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Casting Lava Burst increases the healing of your next Healing Surge by 45%, stacking up to 2 times.

Healing Surge applies Flame Shock to a nearby enemy when empowered by Master of the Elements.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 40 yards for 24% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.
Riptide's initial heal is increased 20% and has a 10% increased critical strike chance.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.8 sec, healing all party or raid members within 40 yards for 84274.8.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Spirit Link Totem reduces damage taken by an additional 5%, and it restores 366,828 health to all nearby allies 1 second after it is dropped. Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Imbue your weapon with the element of Earth for 1 hour. Your Riptide, Healing Wave, Healing Surge, and Chain Heal healing a 20% chance to trigger Earthliving on the target, healing for 58,767 over 6 sec.
Every 4 casts of Riptide also applies Riptide to another friendly target near your Riptide target.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 416,605. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.
Earth Shield reduces damage taken by 5% and its healing is increased by up to 150% as its target's health decreases. Maximum benefit is reached below 50% health.
When you cast Healing Rain, each ally with your Riptide on them is healed for 84,652.
The cooldown of Ascendance is reduced by 60 sec.

When you heal with your Healing Wave, Healing Surge, or Riptide you have a 30% chance to summon an Ancestral spirit to aid you, instantly healing an injured friendly party or raid target within 40 yards for 50% of the amount healed. Critical strikes increase this chance to 60%.

Blast your target with a Primordial Wave, healing them for 30,632 and applying Riptide to them.

Your next Lava Burst will also hit all targets affected by your Flame Shock for 80% of normal damage.

Casting Lava Burst has a 7% chance to activate Ascendance for 6.0 sec.

 scendance

Transform into a Flame Ascendant for 15 sec, replacing Chain Lightning with Lava Beam, removing the cooldown on Lava Burst, and increasing the damage of Lava Burst by an amount equal to your critical strike chance.

When you transform into the Flame Ascendant, instantly cast a Lava Burst at all enemies affected by your Flame Shock, and refresh your Flame Shock durations to 18 sec.
Heals the friendly target for 133,900, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.
Heals the friendly target for 136,958, then jumps up to 15 yards to heal the 3 most injured nearby allies. Healing is reduced by 30% with each jump.

Restorative waters wash over a friendly target, healing them for 124,188 and an additional 68,393 over 18 sec.
Blanket the target area in healing rains, restoring 107,595 health to up to 5 allies over 10 sec.
Deal 34,387 Nature damage every 1 sec to up to 5 enemies inside of your Healing Rain.
An efficient wave of healing energy that restores 262,979 of a friendly targets health.

Casting Riptide grants 2 stacks of Tidal Waves. Tidal Waves reduces the cast time of your next Healing Wave or Chain Heal by 20%, or increases the critical effect chance of your next Healing Surge by 30%.
Your direct heal criticals refund a percentage of your maximum mana: 0.80% from Healing Wave, 0.48% from Healing Surge or Riptide, and 0.20% from Chain Heal.
Consuming Tidal Waves has a chance to reduce the cooldown of your Healing Stream, Cloudburst, Healing Tide, Mana Tide, and Poison Cleansing totems by 3.0 sec.

Summons a totem at the target location for 6 sec, which reduces damage taken by all party and raid members within 10 yards by 10%. Immediately and every 1 sec, the health of all affected players is redistributed evenly.

Summons a totem at your feet for 15 sec that collects power from all of your healing spells. When the totem expires or dies, the stored power is released, healing all injured allies within 40 yards for 24% of all healing done while it was active, divided evenly among targets.

Casting this spell a second time recalls the totem and releases the healing.

Summons a totem at your feet for 10 sec, which pulses every 1.8 sec, healing all party or raid members within 40 yards for 83319.1.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Chain Heal bounces an additional time and its healing is increased by 8%.
Every third Healing Wave or Healing Surge heals for an additional 50%.
Lava Burst has an additional charge.

Transform into a Water Ascendant, duplicating all healing you deal at 70% effectiveness for 15 sec and immediately healing for 411,421. Ascendant healing is distributed evenly among allies within 40 yds.
Every 10 sec, the cast time of your next Chain Heal is reduced by 50%, and jump distance increased by 100%. Maximum of 2 charges.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.

When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance to gain Maelstrom Weapon, stacking up to 5 times. Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon reduces the cast time of your next damage or healing spell by 20%.

A maximum of 5 stacks of Maelstrom Weapon can be consumed at a time.
Energizes both your weapons with lightning and delivers a massive blow to your target, dealing a total of 46,157 Physical damage.
Imbue your main-hand weapon with the element of Wind for 1 hour. Each main-hand attack has a 25% chance to trigger two extra attacks, dealing 7,443 Physical damage each.

Charges your off-hand weapon with lava and burns your target, dealing 15,795 Fire damage.

Damage is increased by 100% if your offhand weapon is imbued with Flametongue Weapon.
Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by 20% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by 20% per stack.
Lava Lash cooldown reduced by 6.0 sec, and if Lava Lash is used against a target affected by your Flame Shock, Flame Shock will be spread to up to 4 enemies near the target.
Harnesses the raw power of the elements, dealing 306,534 Elemental damage and increasing your Critical Strike or Haste by 6% or Mastery by 11% for 10 sec.

Maelstrom Weapon can now stack 5 additional times, and Maelstrom Weapon now increases the damage of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack and the healing of spells it affects by an additional 5% per stack.

Strike your target with an icy blade, dealing 35,912 Frost damage and snaring them by 50% for 6 sec.

Ice Strike increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 100%.
Each stack of Maelstrom Weapon consumed increases the damage of your next Frost Shock by 15%, and causes your next Frost Shock to hit 1 additional target per Maelstrom Weapon stack consumed, up to 5.
Your damage or healing spells will now consume up to 10 Maelstrom Weapon stacks.
Shatters a line of earth in front of you with your main hand weapon, causing 52,242 Flamestrike damage and Incapacitating any enemy hit for 2 sec.
Consuming at least 2 stacks of Hailstorm, using Ice Strike, and each explosion from Fire Nova now also grants you 1 stack of Maelstrom Weapon.
Melee auto-attacks with Flametongue Weapon active have a 5% chance to reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 75% and increase the damage of Lava Lash by 40% for 8 sec.

Electrocutes all enemies in front of you, dealing 8,254 Nature damage. Hitting 2 or more targets enhances your weapons for 12 sec, causing Stormstrike, Ice Strike, and Lava Lash to also deal 7,467 Nature damage to all targets in front of you. Damage reduced beyond 6 targets.
Each time Flame Shock deals periodic damage, increase the damage of your next Lava Lash by 12% and reduce the cooldown of Lava Lash by 0.5 sec.
Each active weapon imbue Increases all Fire, Frost, and Nature damage dealt by 5.0%.

Chain Lightning now jumps to 2 extra targets.
Lava Lash increases the damage of Flame Shock on its target by 100% for 20 sec.
